Text: It is worth noting that this is the English Dubbed version of the game. There is also an NTSC-U version containing Japanese Audio with English Subtitles, which I will upload at a later time.
Hobbit can you please do a copy of xenoblade chronicles...please im begging you bc i can find a decent one no where on the internet

@jblaze55

There are currently no official plans for a North American (NTSC-U) localization of Xenoblade Chronicles. Only speculation and rumor. Use webchella's torrent for the European (PAL) version.

Are you still uploading the subtitle version? Xenoblade has recently been confirmed! But another 2 months I think before release. Great torrents btw, hope to see more of your Wii releases (most are PAL and fewer are wbfs).
